channel.title: Meetings on PrestaShop Project - Open Source e-Commerce platform
channel.description: Recent content in Meetings on PrestaShop Project - Open Source e-Commerce platform

item.description: 2023-05-16 Presents @Robin-Fischer-PS : Member of the Quality Council @boubkerbribri : Member of the Quality Council @AureRita @florine2623 @Progi1984 Report Like Pablo Borowicz said, each council can organize like it wants. So this is the goal of this meeting : define rules for the Quality Council. Members of the council There are 3 profiles which are members of the Quality Council: Issue Manager Software Developer in Test Software Tester Each member can be:

2023-07-10 Presents Anis Zouari (@aniszr) Boubker Bribri (@boubkerbribri) : Member of the Quality Council Faten Mhiri (@MhiriFaten) : Member of the Quality Council Florine Hea (@florine2623) : Member of the Quality Council Franck Lefèvre (@Progi1984) Hibatallah Aouadni (@hibatallahAouadni) : Member of the Quality Council Ines Sallemi (@sallemiines) : Member of the Quality Council Nesrine Abdmouleh (@nesrineabdmouleh) : Member of the Quality Council Robin-Fischer-PS (@Robin-Fischer-PS) : Member of the Quality Council Stéphane Decisy (@SD1982) Absents Aurélien Rita (@AureRita) : Member of the Quality Council Hajer Elleuch (@djoelleuch) : Member of the Quality Council Hana Rebai (@HanaRebaiQA) : Member of the Quality Council Paul-Noël Cholot (@paulnoelcholot) : Member of the Quality Council Report Rules about vote @Robin-Fischer-PS has called for changes to the Quality Council’s voting rules.

2023-12-22 A vote was held for accepting @Progi1984 as maintainer in Quality Council, following his request. Maintainers : ✅ Aurélien Rita (@AureRita) ✅ Boubker Bribri (@boubkerbribri) Faten Mhiri (@MhiriFaten) ✅ Florine Hea (@florine2623) Hajer Elleuch (@djoelleuch) Hana Rebai (@HanaRebaiQA) ✅ Hibatallah Aouadni (@hibatallahAouadni) ✅ Ines Sallemi (@sallemiines) ✅ Nesrine Abdmouleh (@nesrineabdmouleh) ✅ Paul-Noël Cholot (@paulnoelcholot) ✅ Robin-Fischer-PS (@Robin-Fischer-PS) With 8 votes, the request is accepted by the Quality Council : @Progi1984 is now maintainer in Quality Council.
